author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: When there is no configured eca handler configured, only print
out the warning once, instead of on every single call.  This actually
gives a rather impressive performance improvement.

author: doogie
msg: FIX/FEATURE: When shutting down, make certain to close down log4j as
well.  This will ensure that any asynchronous logs have finished
writing to disk, or to the console.
